question: 換気
partsOfSpeech: noun, する verb, の adjective
sourceMnemonic: Something that will <kanji>exchange</kanji> <kanji>energy</kanji> is something that pulls in air, takes out the bad stuff, and then outputs good air, exchanging it for the bad. That is <vocabulary>ventilation</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
